title: 服务器怎么弄成永远无动物的（地皮世界）但是可以用蛋刷出来
author: 窝瓜神
txt_content: RT求求求求求求求求求求求求

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content:
如果装有Multiverse:
到那个世界,输入/mv modify set animals false即可

replies.author: village
replies.txt_content: 不知道唉= =同求答案，我的服务器也想这样弄

replies.author: hexinyue
replies.txt_content: 站在指定世界，输入:/gamerule doMobSpawning false
